metaData.title: Package tours and events in Rosia Montana
metaData.text: We know our area and what can you do and visit here, that's why we prepared some packages with accommodation, guided trails and other activities.

otherPages.title: Daffodils tour
otherPages.text: In the weekends of May we organize guided tours to a place with unforgettable smell and landscape 'The daffodil Meadow'

otherPages.title: Live as a local
otherPages.text: In the last 2 weeks from August you can connect to the nature and to the traditional life of the locals by helping them in their daily work (haymaking, hay stacks, cow milking and other local activities)
